business.headline: ITC share price falls over 3% today. Here's why and should you buy?ITC shares fell over 3% in early trade. The stock is down 2.02% in the last month, and has fallen over 11% in the past 6 months.
Sensex opens over 150 points lower, Nifty below 24,900; ITC down 3%The S&P BSE Sensex fell 164.83 points to 81,386.80, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 22.25 points to 24,803.70 as of 9:26 am.

Belrise Industries listing: Will the stock make strong market debut? Check GMPBelrise Industries IPO received a good response from all types of investors. By the end of the three-day bidding period on May 23, it was subscribed 43.14 times.

Stock market opening: Sensex, Nifty to fall even more today? Check key levelsGift Nifty futures were trading at 24,850.5 at around 8:06 am, suggesting that the Nifty50 may start the day close to its previous close of 24,826.2.

Stocks to watch on May 28: ITC, LIC, SAIL, Belrise Industries, IRCTCSeveral important companies are in focus today, including ITC, LIC, SAIL, Belrise Industries and IRCTC, due to upcoming announcements, stock movements, and earnings results.

Income tax return filing deadline extended from July 31 to September 15This extension mostly helps salaried employees and other individuals whose accounts don't need to be audited. These taxpayers generally have a July 31 deadline each year.
Sensex closes 624 points lower, Nifty below 24,900; IndusInd Bank ends 3% upSensex closes 624 points lower, Nifty below 24,900; IndusInd Bank ends 3% up

Retired before March 2025? Don't miss UPS benefits for you or your spouseIntroduced by the Central Government on April 1, 2025, the UPS provides additional benefits to those who have completed at least 10 years of qualifying service in the Central Government and their legally wedded spouses.

Pakistan's bailout addiction: Why the IMF keeps saving a sinking economyWhy does Pakistan keep turning to the IMF for rescue, but never seems to recover? What's trapping its economy in this endless bailout loop? Dive in to find out.

'GDP means little if it hides empty plates': Analyst on India's inequality crisisIndia's economy may be booming, but over half its people still can't afford three meals a day, notes an analyst. In contrast, smaller African economies like Nigeria, Kenya, and Ghana rank higher in tackling hunger.

Borana Weaves lists at 13% premium: Should you hold or book profit?Borana Weaves' listing was slightly below what many in the market had expected. The grey market premium (GMP) had been showing a possible listing gain of 20-22%, with the premium standing at Rs 43-45 before the listing.

'Could take 50 years': Gurugram startup founder on India matching Japan's lifeIndia's economic journey faces significant hurdles as inequality, agricultural dependency, and regional disparities hinder progress towards matching Japan's quality of life.

entertainment.headline: Stand by decisions: Deepika shares her life mantra amid Vanga row, stuns in redActor Deepika Padukone attended a Cartier event in Sweden on Tuesday night and shared her life philosophy in an interview there. The actor's statement came amid her rumoured exit from Sandeep Reddy Vanga's 'Spirit', which snowballed into a row after the director shared a long cryptic note on social media.

Jr NTR, Kalyan Ram pay tribute to NTR on birth anniversary amid massive crowdActors Jr NTR and Kalyan Ram visited NTR Ghat to pay tribute to their grandfather NTR (Nandamuri Taraka Rama Rao) on his birth anniversary. Their fans gathered at the venue to catch a glimpse of them.

Bhool Chuk Maaf box office Day 5: Rajkummar Rao's film winning the weekdaysRajkummar Rao's 'Bhool Chuk Maaf' continues to perform well during weekdays at the box office. The heartland comedy is slowly inching towards the benchmark of Rs 50 crore in India.

Anushka Sharma blows flying kisses to Virat Kohli after RCB's win over LSG. WatchAnushka Sharma and Virat Kohli blew flying kisses to each other during the Royal Challengers Bengaluru vs Lucknow Super Giants match at IPL 2025 on Tuesday. Their cute video is now going viral on social media.

HBO reveals new Harry Potter cast: Meet the fresh faces of the Wizarding WorldHBO has announced the new cast for its Harry Potter series, with Dominic McLaughlin, Arabella Stanton, and Alastair Stout as the lead trio. Production begins this summer with a star-studded supporting cast.

TV actor Dipika Kakar diagnosed with stage 2 cancer: I will sail through thisTV actor Dipika Kakar has been diagnosed with stage 2 cancer. She remains hopeful and asks fans for prayers as she begins treatment.

Jennifer Lopez dazzles, Heidi Klum disappoints: AMAs 2025 style recapFrom Jennifer Lopez's daring gown to Shaboozey's chaotic layers, the 2025 AMAs were a fashion rollercoaster. Ciara and Wayne Brady dazzled, while Heidi Klum and Montag missed the style mark.

Tom Cruise posts gratitude note after Mission Impossible 8's terrific weekendActor Tom Cruise shared a heartfelt note after the success of 'Mission Impossible: The Final Reckoning' expressing his gratitude to the fans and crew members.
Pankaj Tripathi attends nephew's wedding in Bihar. See pics, videoActor Pankaj Tripathi recently attended his nephew's wedding in Siwan, Bihar. He was also seen posing with the newlyweds.

Viral: When The Phone Rings actor Chae Soo-bin shoots in MumbaiChae Soo-bin of 'When The Phone Rings' fame, was seen filming in Mumbai's rainy streets for Crocs. Her surprise visit has created a buzz among Indian K-drama enthusiasts.

Housefull 5 trailer X reactions: Fans call Akshay Kumar 'comedy ka asli king'Social media users heaped praise on Akshay Kumar's 'Housefull 5' trailer on social media. Fans hailed Akshay Kumar's comic timing ahead of the film's release.

Kanappa team slams 'cowardly attempts' to leak 90 minutes of stolen footageThe 'Kanappa' team has issued an official statement about the stolen hard-drive of their upcoming period action-drama. 24 Frames Factory has alleged that the perpetrators are planning to leak 90-minute footage.

Amid Vanga-Deepika row, Triptii Dimri bags biggest pay cheque of her careerActor Triptii Dimri has secured her biggest fee of Rs 6 crore for the upcoming film 'Spirit'. The project, directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga, features 'Baahubali' star Prabhas in the lead role.

Ajay Devgn, Jackie Chan on action, crossover ahead of Karate Kid: Legends releaseActors Ajay Devgn and Jackie Chan discussed their possible collaboration ahead of 'Karate Kid: Legends' release. The film marks Ajay and Yug Devgan's debut in their voiceovers for the Hindi version of the film.

Rajinikanth gets staggering Rs 150 crore salary for Rs 350 crore-Coolie: ReportDirector Lokesh Kanagaraj's 'Coolie' is reportedly made on a Rs 350-crore budget with Rajinikanth earning a record salary. The film is gearing up for an August release.

Actor Simbu on working with Kamal Haasan: I kept getting lost in his masteryActor Silambarasan aka Simbu expressed admiration for Kamal Haasan's mastery over his craft while filming Mani Ratnam's 'Thug Life'. He also discussed his personal spiritual growth and how it shapes his outlook on life.

Billie Eilish sweeps 2025 AMAs, BTS' RM wins Best K-pop Artist. Full winners listSinger Billie Eilish dominated the 2025 American Music Awards, taking home multiple top honours, including Artist of the Year. Meanwhile, BTS's RM made waves by winning Best K-Pop Artist, marking a major solo milestone. The night celebrated a diverse mix of global talent across genres.

Akshay doesn't 'appreciate' anyone calling Paresh 'foolish' for leaving Hera Pheri 3Akshay Kumar reacted to the media's question about Paresh Rawal being called 'foolish' for leaving 'Hera Pheri 3'. The actor defended his co-star and refrained from commenting on the issue, which is subjudice.

Alia Bhatt attends friend's wedding in Spain, stuns in boho-chic lookBollywood actor Alia Bhatt attended her friend's wedding in Spain. The actor wore a vibrant multi-coloured lehenga paired with a bandanna and sunglasses.

general news.headline: Satellite pics show how India targeted underground complex at Pak's Murid baseSatellite images show a 3-metre-wide crater just 30 metres from the entrance of a highly secured sub-complex, possibly housing an underground facility at Murid air base.

What is social media vetting: The new hurdle for international students in USThe move, a broader State Department plan to mandate social media vetting for all international students to study in America, could disrupt student visa processing and financially strain US universities.

Dance on the table: Australian MP alleges sexist remarks by male colleagueAfghan-Australian Senator Fatima Payman has alleged that the unnamed colleague, who she described as having "had too many drinks," made comments such as, "let's get some wine into you and see you dance on the table."

Trump dangles Golden Dome for Canada: Join US, enter $175B defense plan for freeUS President Donald Trump on Tuesday invited Canada to join his proposed USD 175 billion 'Golden Dome' missile defence system for free -- on the condition that it becomes the 51st state of the United States.

RCB ain't RCB-ing in IPL 2025. Season 18 could finally be theirsIPL 2025: After nine years, RCB have secured a spot in the top two. Jitesh Sharma's magical 85 off 33 in Lucknow on Monday helped them avoid familiar heartbreak and enter the playoffs with a cushion. Looking well-oiled and confident, the former finalists seem poised to finally end their elusive wait for the title.

Ex-Russian President's World War III warning to Trump after his Putin criticismThe warning from Dmitry Medvedev comes after Donald Trump said that Putin was 'playing with fire' by refusing to engage in peace efforts with Ukraine.

Punjab boy who served milk, lassi to jawans during Op Sindoor honoured by ArmyThe Indian Army honoured a 10-year-old boy from Punjab's Ferozepur district for his unwavering committment during the India-Pakistan conflict. He helped the soldiers by bringing water, milk and other items as they fought the battle in the scorching heat.

Justice Varma may face impeachment in cash row as Centre weighs optionsThe Centre is currently exploring options to move an impeachment motion against Allahabad High Court judge Yashwant Varma, weeks after a Supreme Court-appointed in-house committee found him guilty of possessing unaccounted cash at his official residence in Delhi.

Anushka Sharma blows flying kisses to Virat Kohli after RCB's win over LSG. WatchAnushka Sharma and Virat Kohli blew flying kisses to each other during the Royal Challengers Bengaluru vs Lucknow Super Giants match at IPL 2025 on Tuesday. Their cute video is now going viral on social media.

Amazon Fashion's 'SERVE' Store Offers Convenience, Selection and Value to Gen Z, says Nikhil Sinha, Director, Amazon FashionIndia's first dedicated Gen Z fashion store democratizes style access across the country with 3X customer growth

Actor Kamal Haasan says Kannada was born out of Tamil, faces backlashActor Kamal Haasan made a remark that Kannada language originated from Tamil at a film event in Chennai. The remark has triggered protests in Karnataka, with pro-Kannada groups demanding an apology.

Starship crashes over Indian Ocean as SpaceX loses control mid-flightThe Starship upper stage was carrying eight Starlink simulator satellites, intended to be deployed in orbit as part of SpaceX's ongoing efforts to validate the vehicle.

TV actor Dipika Kakar diagnosed with stage 2 cancer: I will sail through thisTV actor Dipika Kakar has been diagnosed with stage 2 cancer. She remains hopeful and asks fans for prayers as she begins treatment.

Pantastic: LSG owner's one-word praise for Rishabh Pant after 118 goes viralIPL 2025, LSG vs RCB: Rishabh Pant scored his maiden IPL hundred for Lucknow Super Giants on Tuesday. Owner Sanjiv Goenka congratulated the skipper with a one-word social media post.

You're playing with fire: Trump rebukes Putin as Ukraine war escalatesDonald Trump warned Vladimir Putin, saying that he is 'playing with fire' amid Russia's latest military gains in Ukraine. Responding to Trump, former Russian Prime Minister and close Putin ally Dmitry Medvedev said the only real danger would be the outbreak of World War III.

Operation Sindoor: Indian Army reveals designers behind viral logoTwo Indian Army personnel designed Operation Sindoor's symbolic logo, which has become a viral emblem of justice following precision strikes in response to the Pahalgam massacre. The logo reflects India's resolve against terror.

Will Nara Lokesh be crowned TDP's king-in-waiting at Mahanadu?As the TDP's three-day Mahanadu event started on Tuesday, all eyes were on Nara Lokesh, son of party chief and CM N Chandrababu Naidu. With Lokesh credited for the party's 2024 poll success, reports suggest that he may soon be officially named TDP's working president, the No. 2 in the party.

Ghulam Nabi Azad, part of Op Sindoor delegation, hospitalised mid-tour in KuwaitFormer Union Minister Ghulam Nabi Azad, who is a part of the outreach delegation on Operation Sindoor, has been admitted to hospital during his tour to Saudi Arabia.

Patel differed with Nehru on Kashmir, says PM Modi. Here are the factsPrime Minister Narendra Modi recently said the Congress government under Jawaharlal Nehru did not heed the advice of then-Home Minister Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel on the Kashmir issue in 1947. What was Patel's stand on military action to reclaim Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (POK) and taking the issue to the UN? Here's a look at how Patel and Nehru diverged on Kashmir.

Indore couple goes missing in Meghalaya, abandoned scooter found on hillsideA honeymooning couple from Indore has gone missing near Sohra in Meghalaya, marking the second case of tourist disappearance in East Khasi Hills in two months.

HBO reveals new Harry Potter cast: Meet the fresh faces of the Wizarding WorldHBO has announced the new cast for its Harry Potter series, with Dominic McLaughlin, Arabella Stanton, and Alastair Stout as the lead trio. Production begins this summer with a star-studded supporting cast.

Pakistan player's 'arrogant' handshake with Indian tennis star shocks fansIndia defeated Pakistan 2-0 in the Junior Davis Cup U16 tournament in Kazakhstan. The match sparked controversy after an unsportsmanlike handshake from one of Pakistan's players.

Covid comeback? US detects new variant linked to China's latest surgeA fast-spreading Covid-19 variant from China, NB.1.8.1, has reached the US. Though less deadly, experts warn it's more contagious and may evade vaccine protection.

Business ruin, years spent evading creditors: What led to Panchkula mass suicideSeven members of a family died by mass suicide in Panchkula. Police investigation revealed that the faily had a debt of Rs 20 crore and had been moving around over the past few years to escape creditors.

sports.headline: Rishabh Pant's ability and calibre were never in doubt: Zaheer KhanIPL 2025, LSG vs RCB: Zaheer Khan said that the IPL season was a learning experience for Rishabh Pant, who scored a 54-ball century on Tuesday against the Royal Challengers Bengaluru.

Arjun Erigaisi hands D Gukesh second straight defeat at Norway ChessArjun Erigaisi continued his stellar run at the 2025 Norway Chess tournament, handing D Gukesh a second consecutive defeat and firmly establishing himself as a serious contender in one of the year's toughest fields.

Virat Kohli genius par excellence: Dinesh Karthik praises RCB chase masterIPL 2025: Virat Kohli's composed 54 and Jitesh Sharma's explosive and unbeaten 85 powered RCB past LSG into Qualifier 1, reviving title hopes and ending a nine-year wait with their record seventh consecutive away win.

Method behind Jitesh madness: Dinesh Karthik reveals how RCB finisher was mouldedAfter Jitesh Sharma produced a career-best 85* against LSG, Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batting coach Dinesh Karthik revealed how the wicketkeeper transformed into a calm finisher through dedicated work in the offseason.

Rishabh Pant plans short break to recharge before England seriesAfter LSG's loss to RCB, Rishabh Pant said he plans to "switch off" for a few days before departing for the Test tour of England, to be in a "good frame of mind."

RCB ain't RCB-ing in IPL 2025. Season 18 could finally be theirsIPL 2025: After nine years, RCB have secured a spot in the top two. Jitesh Sharma's magical 85 off 33 in Lucknow on Monday helped them avoid familiar heartbreak and enter the playoffs with a cushion. Looking well-oiled and confident, the former finalists seem poised to finally end their elusive wait for the title.

Gael Monfils scripts history with heroic comeback in first roundFrench Open 2025: Gael Monfils became the oldest player in the Open Era to win a match at Roland Garros after beating Bolivia's Hugo Dellien 4–6, 3–6, 6–1, 7–6 (4), 6–1 on Tuesday.

RCB's stunning record, Kohli's 9k: All stats from IPL 2025's last league gameRoyal Challengers Bengaluru stunned Lucknow Super Giants by chasing 228 runs in 18.4 overs at Ekana Stadium. This historic win secured RCB's second place and a Qualifier 1 spot.

Barcelona starboy Lamine Yamal extends contract till 2031Barcelona's teenage star Lamine Yamal has signed a contract extension until 2031. This deal rewards his outstanding 2024–25 season and sets the stage for future success at the club.

Jitesh is here: Old interview goes viral as RCB storm into Qualifier 1Jitesh Sharma played a sensational unbeaten innings of 85 off 33 balls to guide RCB to a must-win victory over Lucknow Super Giants. After the match, one of his old interviews went viral on social media.

Jitesh Sharma credits 'guru Dinesh Karthik anna' after heroic finish vs LSGAfter playing a match-winning 85-run knock against LSG, stand-in skipper Jitesh Sharma credited RCB batting coach Dinesh Karthik's mentorship for shaping his mindset under pressure.

Gael Monfils scripts history with heroic comeback in first roundFrench Open 2025: Gael Monfils became the oldest player in the Open Era to win a match at Roland Garros after beating Bolivia's Hugo Dellien 4–6, 3–6, 6–1, 7–6 (4), 6–1 on Tuesday.

RCB's stunning record, Kohli's 9k: All stats from IPL 2025's last league gameRoyal Challengers Bengaluru stunned Lucknow Super Giants by chasing 228 runs in 18.4 overs at Ekana Stadium. This historic win secured RCB's second place and a Qualifier 1 spot.

Barcelona starboy Lamine Yamal extends contract till 2031Barcelona's teenage star Lamine Yamal has signed a contract extension until 2031. This deal rewards his outstanding 2024–25 season and sets the stage for future success at the club.

Jitesh is here: Old interview goes viral as RCB storm into Qualifier 1Jitesh Sharma played a sensational unbeaten innings of 85 off 33 balls to guide RCB to a must-win victory over Lucknow Super Giants. After the match, one of his old interviews went viral on social media.

Jitesh Sharma credits 'guru Dinesh Karthik anna' after heroic finish vs LSGAfter playing a match-winning 85-run knock against LSG, stand-in skipper Jitesh Sharma credited RCB batting coach Dinesh Karthik's mentorship for shaping his mindset under pressure.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
